name: A-RISE
description: A-RISE was a school idol trio formed and led by Tsubasa Kira in Love Live!. They were the school idol group of UTX High School. A-RISE consisted of three members, all of whom are third years. They were depicted as the rival group of µ's. They originally debuted with the song Private Wars before they disbanded prior to the ending of Love Live! The School Idol Movie.
